g_lock_conflicts  PLS_INTEGER := 0;

                       , o_rt_tse   OUT lm_technical_segm_performances%ROWTYPE )

;

                           , o_rt_tse  OUT lm_technical_segm_performances%ROWTYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN

                           , o_rt_tse   OUT lm_technical_segm_performances%ROWTYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN

                               , o_rt_tse  OUT lm_technical_segm_performances%ROWTYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN

                       , io_rt_tse  IN OUT lm_technical_segm_performances%ROWTYPE )
RETURN NUMBER

RETURN BOOLEAN
;

RETURN lm_technical_segm_performances.ID%TYPE
;


END lm_tse_tapi_pck;

function tse_select_row( i_tse_id   in  lm_technical_segm_performances.id%type
                       , o_rt_tse   out lm_technical_segm_performances%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.tse_select_row';
   l_found                boolean      := false;
begin
   declare
      cursor c_tse ( i_tse_id   in  lm_technical_segm_performances.id%type )
      is 
           select *
             from lm_technical_segm_performances tse
            where tse.id = i_tse_id ;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         open c_tse( i_tse_id => i_tse_id );
         fetch c_tse into o_rt_tse;
         l_found := c_tse%found;
         close c_tse;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc 
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

      return l_found;

   exception
      when others
      then
         if c_tse%isopen
         then
            close c_tse;
         end if;

         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end tse_select_row;

return boolean

   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.tse_select_row_uk1';
   l_found                boolean      := false;
begin
   declare
      cursor c_tse ( i_tse_tst_id   in  lm_technical_segm_performances.tst_id%type )
      is
         select *
           from lm_technical_segm_performances tse
          where tse.tst_id = i_tse_tst_id ;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         open c_tse(i_tse_tst_id => i_tse_tst_id);
         fetch c_tse into o_rt_tse;
         l_found := c_tse%found;
         close c_tse;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

      return l_found;

   exception
   when others
    then
      if c_tse%isopen
      then
         close c_tse;
      end if;
      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

      viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end tse_select_row_uk1;

function tse_select_row_upd( i_tse_id   in  lm_technical_segm_performances.id%type
                           , o_rt_tse   out lm_technical_segm_performances%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.tse_select_row_upd';
   l_found                boolean      := false;

   cursor c_tse ( i_tse_id   in  lm_technical_segm_performances.id%type )
   is
           select *
             from lm_technical_segm_performances tse
            where tse.id = i_tse_id 
         for update;
begin
   viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

   
   open c_tse( i_tse_id => i_tse_id );
   fetch c_tse into o_rt_tse;
   l_found := c_tse%found;
   close c_tse;

   viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                          , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

   return l_found;

exception
   when others
   then
      if c_tse%isopen
      then
         close c_tse;
      end if;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

      viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );

end tse_select_row_upd;

function tse_select_row_upd_uk1( i_tse_tst_id   in  lm_technical_segm_performances.tst_id%type
                               , o_rt_tse  out lm_technical_segm_performances%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.tse_select_row_upd_uk1';
   l_found                boolean      := false;
begin
   begin
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      
      l_found := tse_select_row_uk1( i_tse_tst_id   =>  i_tse_tst_id
                                   , o_rt_tse => o_rt_tse );
      if l_found
      then
         
         l_found := tse_select_row_upd( i_tse_id => o_rt_tse.id
                                      , o_rt_tse => o_rt_tse );
      end if;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

      return l_found;

   exception
      when others
      then
        viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                               , i_debug_info => sqlerrm);

        viu_info.raise_info(i_calling_procedure => con_proc);
   end;
end tse_select_row_upd_uk1;

procedure tse_lock_row( i_tse_id   in  lm_technical_segm_performances.id%type )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.tse_lock_row';
begin
  declare
     cursor c_tse ( i_tse_id   in  lm_technical_segm_performances.id%type )
     is
             select ''
               from lm_technical_segm_performances tse
              where tse.id = i_tse_id 
         for update;

   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin
         
         if i_tse_id is not null
         then
            begin
                
                tse_lock_row_nowait( i_tse_id => i_tse_id );
            exception
               when viu_constant.exc_lockfailed
               then
                  
                  g_lock_conflicts := g_lock_conflicts + 1;

                  
                  viu_info.reset_package_variables;

                  
                  open c_tse( i_tse_id => i_tse_id );
                  close c_tse;
               end;
         end if;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
         if c_tse%isopen
         then
            close c_tse;
         end if;

         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info(i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end tse_lock_row;

procedure tse_lock_row_nowait( i_tse_id   in  lm_technical_segm_performances.id%type )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.tse_lock_row_nowait';
begin
   declare
      cursor c_tse ( i_tse_id   in  lm_technical_segm_performances.id%type )
      is
              select ''
                from lm_technical_segm_performances tse
               where tse.id = i_tse_id 
          for update nowait;

   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin

         
         if i_tse_id is not null
         then
            
            open c_tse( i_tse_id => i_tse_id );

            close c_tse;
         end if;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
        if c_tse%isopen
        then
           close c_tse;
        end if;

        viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                               , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

        viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_lockfailed
                           , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                           , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                           , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                           , i_additional_data   =>   'ID = "'||i_tse_id||'"' );
   end;                                                          
end tse_lock_row_nowait;

function tse_perform_update( i_tse_id   in     lm_technical_segm_performances.id%type
                           , io_rt_tse  in out lm_technical_segm_performances%rowtype )
return number
;

function tse_perform_delete( i_tse_id   in  lm_technical_segm_performances.id%type )
return boolean
;

procedure tse_insert_row ( io_rt_tse  in out lm_technical_segm_performances%rowtype )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.tse_insert_row';
begin
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      
      begin
         insert into lm_technical_segm_performances( id
                                , tst_id
                                , event_time
                                , number_of_items )
              values ( io_rt_tse.id
                     , io_rt_tse.tst_id
                     , io_rt_tse.event_time
                     , io_rt_tse.number_of_items )
           returning id
                   , tst_id
                   , event_time
                   , number_of_items
                into io_rt_tse.id
                   , io_rt_tse.tst_id
                   , io_rt_tse.event_time
                   , io_rt_tse.number_of_items;

      exception
         when others
         then
            viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_insertfailed
                               , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                               , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                               , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                               , i_additional_data   => substr('ID = "'||io_rt_tse.id||'"'
                                                             ||', TST_ID = "'||io_rt_tse.tst_id||'"'
                                                             ||', EVENT_TIME = "'||io_rt_tse.event_time||'"'
                                                             ||', NUMBER_OF_ITEMS = "'||io_rt_tse.number_of_items||'"'                                                              , 1, 4000));
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end tse_insert_row;

function tse_perform_update( i_tse_id   in     lm_technical_segm_performances.id%type
                           , io_rt_tse  in out lm_technical_segm_performances%rowtype )
return number
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.tse_perform_update';
begin
   
   declare
      l_rowcount  number := 0;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin
         update lm_technical_segm_performances
            set id = io_rt_tse.id
              , tst_id = io_rt_tse.tst_id
              , event_time = io_rt_tse.event_time
              , number_of_items = io_rt_tse.number_of_items
          where id = i_tse_id
      returning id
              , tst_id
              , event_time
              , number_of_items
           into io_rt_tse.id
              , io_rt_tse.tst_id
              , io_rt_tse.event_time
              , io_rt_tse.number_of_items;

         l_rowcount := sql%rowcount;
      exception
         when others
         then
            viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_updatefailed
                               , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                               , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                               , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                               , i_additional_data   => substr('ID = "'||io_rt_tse.id||'"'
                                                             ||', TST_ID = "'||io_rt_tse.tst_id||'"'
                                                             ||', EVENT_TIME = "'||io_rt_tse.event_time||'"'
                                                             ||', NUMBER_OF_ITEMS = "'||io_rt_tse.number_of_items||'"'                                                              , 1, 4000));
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => to_char(l_rowcount)||' rows updated' );

      return l_rowcount;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end tse_perform_update;

function tse_perform_delete( i_tse_id   in  lm_technical_segm_performances.id%type )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.tse_perform_delete';
begin
   
   declare
      l_found  boolean := false;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         delete
           from lm_technical_segm_performances
          where id = i_tse_id;

         l_found := sql%found;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );
      return l_found;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_deletefailed
                            , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                            , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                            , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                            , i_additional_data   =>   'ID = "'||i_tse_id||'"' );
   end;                                                          
end tse_perform_delete;

function tse_update_row( i_tse_id   in     lm_technical_segm_performances.id%type
                       , io_rt_tse  in out lm_technical_segm_performances%rowtype )
return number
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.tse_update_row';
begin
   declare
      l_rowcount  number := 0;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         
         tse_lock_row( i_tse_id   =>  i_tse_id );

         
         l_rowcount := 
            tse_perform_update( i_tse_id   =>  i_tse_id
                              , io_rt_tse  => io_rt_tse );
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => to_char(l_rowcount) ||' rows updated');
      return l_rowcount;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm);

         viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_updatefailed
                            , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                            , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                            , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                            , i_additional_data   => substr('ID = "'||io_rt_tse.id||'"'
                                                          ||', TST_ID = "'||io_rt_tse.tst_id||'"'
                                                          ||', EVENT_TIME = "'||io_rt_tse.event_time||'"'
                                                          ||', NUMBER_OF_ITEMS = "'||io_rt_tse.number_of_items||'"'                                                           , 1, 4000));
   end;                                                          
end tse_update_row;

function tse_delete_row( i_tse_id   in  lm_technical_segm_performances.id%type )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.tse_delete_row';
begin
   declare
      l_deleted  boolean := false;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         
         tse_lock_row( i_tse_id   =>  i_tse_id );

         
         l_deleted := tse_perform_delete( i_tse_id   =>  i_tse_id );
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

      return l_deleted;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_deletefailed
                            , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                            , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                            , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                            , i_additional_data   =>   'ID = "'||i_tse_id||'"' );
   end;                                                          
end tse_delete_row;

function tse_seq1_nextval
return lm_technical_segm_performances.id%type
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.tse_seq1_nextval';
   l_tse_id  lm_technical_segm_performances.id%type;
begin
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         select lm_tse_seq1.nextval 
           into l_tse_id
           from dual;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

      return l_tse_id;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end tse_seq1_nextval;


end lm_tse_tapi_pck;
